title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies: Problem-Based Learning for Collaborative VR Environment Design and Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic VR Development Tool Usage and Understanding of Social Studies Theories, Collaborative Project Experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative scenarios for solving social problems in a VR environment
Learners can accurately evaluate peers' VR educational modules with ≥80% accuracy using peer assessment rubrics
Through iterative design processes (≥3 cycles), learners can improve VR educational content to meet five quality criteria (immersion, interactivity, learning effectiveness, etc.)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
